abstract: The award, for young singers who have already appeared in featured solo roles at the Metropolitan Opera, comes with $50,000.

headline.main: Quinn Kelsey, Baritone, Wins Beverly Sills Artist Award
headline.print_headline: Baritone From Hawaii Wins Sills Award

snippet: The award, for young singers who have already appeared in featured solo roles at the Metropolitan Opera, comes with $50,000.
